attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks until November 1st earliest. Pets suffer around bonfire night every year. Why do pets have to have them suffer for weeks before. Also, look at the age bracket fireworks are sold to. We have restrictions on alcohol and tobacco sales.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
